note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
This is the current home of SCGraph, a graphics server for SuperCollider. Currently, development happens mostly in the master-3.6 branch, which only works with the yet unreleased SuperCollider 3.6. 

Current features:

* writing and playing SynthDefs with graphics rate UGens (e. g. a cube: GCube.gr)
* shaders
* loading and displaying textures

Planned features include:

* loading and handling textures and videos like scsynth audio buffers
* loading 3d models
* displaying and handling fonts and strings 
* some new 3d primitives (spheres, meshes, teapots...)
* support for sclang Ndef's 

### Authors and Contributors
Original author: @fps

Current maintainer: @mortuosplango

### What does that all mean? What can I do with it?

Some videos:

* [VJing with SCGraph](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h8OVRCsaNLM)
* [New feature: a feedback texture](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4JGNwZLieQU)

### Support or Contact
Feel free to open issues and fork as needed. 

There's also a mailing list on sourceforge: [scgraph-users](http://sourceforge.net/mailarchive/forum.php?forum_name=scgraph-users)
name: SCGraph
